choose.otherwise: `role_id` AS `roleId`, `role_name` AS `roleName`, `role_key` AS `roleKey`, `role_sort` AS `roleSort`, `data_scope` AS `dataScope`, `status` AS `status`, `del_flag` AS `delFlag`, `create_by` AS `createBy`, `create_time` AS `createTime`, `update_by` AS `updateBy`, `update_time` AS `updateTime`, `remark` AS `remark`
